name: Run Machine: Finger Challenger
description:
Run with your fingers on a Treadmill Simulation to beat olympic and world record

*** Warning! pressing too hard can damage your phone.
--- Using your fingers, press the screen as fast as you are racing in leg.
--- Running as fast as possible to break the record of other players all over the world, I think you could be the fastest person on the earth.
--- It is a great tool for you to practice endurance, stamina, agility and Calories burned.
*** You are the first in the world to conquer distance of 30km, share your video, maybe you would become a famous person.
--- Run run and run, you will continue or give up? Will can select the give up button whenever you want.
--- Like a hurdler contest, you must avoid the bricks on the road if you do not want to stumble.
--- Start the day with a treadmill, you'll see his body full of energy
--- Avoid using multi-touch when play to avoid fraud
(First releast)
